amendatorysection.para: A person commits a Class III felony if:
(1) Such person willfully and knowingly performs or causes to be performed any act to:
(a) Apply, remove, damage, or alter an approved nonvisual identifier; or
(b) Expunge, alter, render inaccessible, or otherwise corrupt information recorded or embedded on or in an approved nonvisual identifier; and
(2) Such conduct is done with the intent to deprive an owner of livestock or falsely assert ownership of livestock.
